item.title: 贝莱德将 30 亿美元的 Rieder 共同基金转为 ETF
item.description: 贝莱德公司正在将全球固定收益首席投资官里克-里德（Rick Rieder）管理的两只共同基金转换为 ETF，以便将这些策略更好地融入公司蓬勃发展的模型投资组合生态系统。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is converting two mutual funds — managed by Chief Investment Officer of global fixed income Rick Rieder — into ETFs to better fit the strategies into the firm’s booming model-portfolio ecosystem.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师认为美联储降息导致股市涨势受阻
item.description: 华尔街顶级策略师表示，在美联储本周预期降息后，创纪录的美股涨势有可能暂时失去动力。【原文：Top Wall Street strategists said the record-setting US stock rally risks temporarily running out of steam after an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut this week.】

item.title: 关税成本增加，小企业求助于贷款初创公司
item.description:
从中国进口商品的公司对短期贷款的需求激增。【原文：

Demand for short-term loans is spiking among companies that import merchandise from China.

】

item.title: 关键铬铁堡垒受制于南非的能源成本
item.description: 南非能源价格的持续上涨有可能扼杀一个制造不锈钢关键原料的行业，并改变美国和其他国家的供应链。【原文：A sustained rise in energy prices in South Africa is threatening to smother an industry that makes a key stainless-steel ingredient and alter supply chains to the US and other nations.】

item.title: 美联储对宽松前景的反击将推翻看涨押注
item.description:
投资者期待杰罗姆-鲍威尔发出鸽派信息。【原文：

Investors are counting on a dovish message from Jerome Powell. 

】

item.title: 洪水和关税风险加剧，巴基斯坦维持关键利率不变
item.description: 巴基斯坦央行连续第三次在政策会议上维持关键利率不变，表明在山洪暴发和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策增加风险的情况下将保持谨慎。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank kept its key rate unchanged for a third straight policy meeting, signaling caution as flash floods and US President Donald Trump’s tariffs add to risks.】

item.title: 印度贸易逆差缩小，出口商仍在为关税做准备
item.description: 印度 8 月份的贸易赤字有所收窄，尽管出口商们正准备承受唐纳德-特朗普总统征收 50%关税带来的痛苦，这些关税可能会打击多个劳动密集型行业。【原文：India’s trade deficit narrowed in August, even as exporters brace for pain from President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs, which threaten to hit several labor-intensive sectors.】

item.title: 降息临近，华尔街几乎放弃了对贸易的担忧
item.description: 对美联储降息的乐观情绪，让华尔街许多人对全球贸易战的焦虑牢牢地留在了后视镜中。【原文：Optimism over Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts is putting anxiety over a global trade war firmly in the rearview mirror for many on Wall Street.】

item.title: 韩国 FuriosaAI 公司计划在首次公开募股前筹集 3 亿美元资金
item.description: 位于首尔的芯片初创公司 FuriosaAI 正准备在潜在的首次公开募股前融资回合中筹集超过 3 亿美元的资金，以挑战英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：FuriosaAI, the Seoul-based chip startup seeking to challenge Nvidia Corp., is preparing to raise more than $300 million in a potential pre-initial public offering funding round.】

item.title: 外国投资者为寻求收益抢购南非债券
item.description: 外国投资者正在抢购南非债券，以寻求更高的实际收益。【原文：Foreign investors are snapping up South African bonds as they search out higher real yields.】

item.title: 瑞士上议院将就瑞银 30 亿美元资本措施进行表决
item.description: 瑞士立法者将于周一就第二次试图推迟银行资本质量新规则的投票进行表决，新规则将使瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的资本要求提高约 30 亿美元。【原文：Swiss lawmakers will on Monday vote on a second attempt to delay new rules for bank capital quality which are set to lift UBS Group AG’s capital requirements by some $3 billion.】

item.title: 中国建筑商国际发展有限公司地方债务重组获债权人批准
item.description: 中国国际金融有限公司（CIFI Holdings Group Co.【原文：CIFI Holdings Group Co. received creditors’ support for reorganizing about 10.1 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) of onshore debt, becoming the latest defaulted Chinese developer to make a breakthrough in a typically protracted process.】

item.title: Anthropic 发现企业主要利用人工智能实现工作自动化
item.description: 根据OpenAI竞争对手的一份新报告，企业绝大多数依赖Anthropic的人工智能软件来实现工作自动化，而不是进行协作，这增加了人工智能颠覆生计的风险。【原文：Businesses are overwhelmingly relying on Anthropic’s artificial intelligence software to automate rather than collaborate on work, according to a new report from the OpenAI rival, adding to the risk that AI will upend livelihoods.】

item.title: 库存吸引买家，加拿大房屋销售连续第五个月增长
item.description: 由于大量房源吸引买家重返市场，加拿大房屋销售连续第五个月增长。【原文：Canadian home sales rose for a fifth straight month as a buildup of listings lured buyers back to the market.】

item.title: 法国汽车金融公司 RCI 首次进军强劲的 AT1 市场
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司（Renault SA）的汽车融资部门 RCI Banque SA 正寻求出售其首笔附加一级债券，而此时投资者正在抢购这种高风险的债务。【原文：Renault SA’s car financing unit RCI Banque SA is looking to sell its first Additional Tier 1 bond at a time when investors are snapping up this risky type of debt.】

item.title: TPG 和 Sanabil 牵头为沙特金融科技公司 Hala 筹资 1.57 亿美元
item.description: Hala 是一家总部位于沙特阿拉伯的金融科技公司，在中东地区早期初创企业有史以来最大的一轮融资中筹集了 1.57 亿美元。【原文：Hala, a Saudi Arabia-based fintech company, raised $157 million in one of the largest-ever funding rounds for an early-stage startup in the Middle East.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔敦促警惕通胀上行风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）表示，欧洲中央银行必须保持警惕，以应对通胀上行的危险。【原文：The European Central Bank must remain on alert to tackle upside dangers to inflation, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 印尼增加 10 亿美元大米援助和减税措施以刺激经济增长
item.description: 印度尼西亚今年将增加 16 万亿印尼盾（9.89 亿美元）的刺激措施，以保持东南亚最大经济体的增长。【原文：Indonesia will add 16 trillion rupiah ($989 million) in stimulus this year to maintain growth in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 中国在初步调查后认定英伟达违反反垄断法
item.description: 中国在完成初步调查后裁定英伟达公司违反了反垄断法，在敏感的贸易谈判中加大了对华盛顿的压力。【原文：China ruled that Nvidia Corp. violated anti-monopoly laws after concluding a preliminary investigation, ratcheting up the pressure on Washington during sensitive trade negotiations.】

item.title: ICG 为第二支欧洲基础设施基金融资 31.5 亿欧元
item.description: 资产管理公司 ICG Plc 为其第二支欧洲基础设施基金募集到 31.5 亿欧元（37 亿美元）的承付款，北美投资者对该地区投资机会的强劲需求为该基金提供了支持。【原文：Asset manager ICG Plc has raised €3.15 billion ($3.7 billion) of commitments for its second European infrastructure fund, supported by strong demand from North American investors eyeing investment opportunities in the region.】

item.title: 纸板箱启示录与美国经济状况
item.description:
纸箱出货量急剧下降。【原文：

Shipments of boxes are plunging.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：美国经济中的纸板箱启示录（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：美国经济中的纸板箱启示录（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: The Cardboard Boxpocalypse in the US Economy (Podcast)】

item.title: 满载俄罗斯原油的受制裁油轮驶近阿达尼港
item.description: 一艘载有俄罗斯石油的受制裁油轮已驶近阿达尼集团运营的印度港口，这可能是禁令生效后最后一批在该集团设施卸货的黑名单船只之一。【原文：A sanctioned tanker carrying Russian oil has neared an Indian port operated by Adani Group, and will likely be one of the last blacklisted vessels to unload at the conglomerate’s facilities after a ban took effect.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所集团启动区块链平台，供私募基金使用
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团（London Stock Exchange Group Plc）推出了一个基于区块链的平台，该平台最初专注于私募基金，标志着该交易所运营商开始向数字资产领域进军。【原文：London Stock Exchange Group Plc has rolled out a blockchain-based platform initially focused on private funds, marking a push by the bourse operator into digital assets.】

item.title: 南非银行呼吁部长改变信贷法
item.description: 南非最高级别的银行业游说团体批评政府撤回了旨在帮助小企业获得贷款的《国家信贷法》修改提案。【原文：South Africa’s top banking lobby group criticized the government’s withdrawal of proposed changes to the National Credit Act that were meant to help small firms secure loans.】

item.title: 花旗银行任命新任新加坡国家主管
item.description: 花旗集团任命 Lee Lung Nien 为新加坡国家官员兼银行业务负责人，接替任职两年后即将离任的 Tibor Pandi。【原文：Citigroup Inc. appointed Lee Lung Nien as country officer and banking head for Singapore, taking over from Tibor Pandi who is leaving after two years in the role.】

item.title: 据说泰国将对黄金交易征税以减缓泰铢涨势
item.description: 泰国当局正在考虑对实物黄金交易征税，以减缓已威胁到出口和旅游业的泰国货币涨势。【原文：Thai authorities are considering a tax on physical gold trading to slow a rally in the nation’s currency that has threatened exports and tourism.】

item.title: Orsted 拟折价 67% 出售股票，融资 94 亿美元
item.description: Orsted A/S 计划以 67% 的折扣出售新股，因为这家海上风电开发商在押注美国市场出错后，正努力重建投资者的信心。【原文：Orsted A/S plans to sell new shares at a 67% discount as the offshore wind developer works to rebuild investor confidence after a bet on the US market went wrong.】

item.title: 小米加快旗舰智能手机发布步伐，欲与 iPhone 17 一较高下
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）将于本月发布下一款旗舰智能手机，并更新其品牌形象，以与苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Xiaomi Corp. will release its next flagship smartphone this month and update its branding in a measure to go head-to-head with Apple Inc. for a share of the premium smartphone market.】

item.title: 中国电池制造商因 "固态 "技术的发展前景而受益
item.description: 更强大的电动汽车电池有望在全球范围内投入使用--至少中国投资者是这么认为的。【原文：One of the great hopes for more powerful electric vehicle batteries is getting closer to hitting the world’s roads – at least according to Chinese investors.】
